import React,{useState} from 'react' const Register = () => { const [password,setPassword] = useState('') const [email,setEmail] = useState('') const [name,setName] = useState('') const [file,setFile] = useState('') const setImage =(e)=>{ console.log(e) const file = e.target.files[0]; let formData = new FormData() formData.append('image', file) console.log([...formData]) console.log(e.target.value) } return (

Register

setName(e.target.value)} />
